# ===============================================================================
# COMPANY OVERVIEW
# ===============================================================================

## About TIGON Spray
TIGON Spray is the leading manufacturer and retailer of professional golf cart
cleaning and protection products. Founded with a mission to provide golf cart
owners with the same quality care products used by professional golf course
maintenance teams.

Our specialty is developing spray-based formulas that clean, protect, and
maintain golf carts of all types - from personal recreational carts to
commercial fleet vehicles used at golf courses and resorts.

## Mission Statement
To provide golf cart owners with professional-grade cleaning and protection
products that are easy to use, environmentally responsible, and deliver
showroom-quality results.

## Core Values
- Quality: Professional-grade formulas made in USA
- Convenience: Easy spray-on application, no rinsing required
- Protection: Advanced UV and environmental protection
- Sustainability: Biodegradable, eco-friendly formulations

# ===============================================================================
# PRODUCT CATALOG WITH DETAILED SPECIFICATIONS
# ===============================================================================

## Product 1: TIGON Spray Original Formula
- SKU: TIGON-ORIG-16
- Price: $24.99 USD
- Size: 16 fl oz (473ml)
- Form Factor: Spray bottle
- Description: The original TIGON Spray formula provides superior protection
  and cleaning for your golf cart. Our proven blend removes dirt, grime, and
  buildup while creating a protective barrier against the elements.
- Key Features:
  * Fast-acting spray formula
  * Safe for all golf cart surfaces (plastic, vinyl, rubber, painted metal)
  * UV protection coating prevents fading
  * Easy application, no rinsing required
  * Professional-grade concentration
- Best For: Everyday golf cart maintenance and regular cleaning
- Use Frequency: Weekly or after each round of golf
- Application: Spray directly on surface, wipe with microfiber cloth

## Product 2: TIGON Spray Pro Shield
- SKU: TIGON-PRO-20
- Price: $34.99 USD
- Size: 20 fl oz (591ml)
- Form Factor: Spray bottle
- Description: Advanced professional-grade protection for demanding golf course
  conditions. Pro Shield offers enhanced durability and extended protection
  for golf carts exposed to harsh weather and frequent use.
- Key Features:
  * Professional-grade formula
  * Extended UV protection (up to 30 days)
  * Water-resistant protective coating
  * Prevents oxidation and fading
  * Commercial-strength formulation
- Best For: Golf courses, rental fleets, heavy-use environments
- Use Frequency: Every 2-4 weeks depending on exposure
- Application: Apply to clean surface in thin coats

## Product 3: TIGON Spray Ultra Clean
- SKU: TIGON-ULTRA-18
- Price: $29.99 USD
- Size: 18 fl oz (532ml)
- Form Factor: Spray bottle
- Description: Maximum cleaning power for the toughest jobs. Ultra Clean's
  enhanced formula tackles stubborn stains, tree sap, bird droppings, and
  heavy oxidation while maintaining surface integrity.
- Key Features:
  * Maximum cleaning strength
  * Removes tough stains and oxidation
  * Deep cleaning action for neglected carts
  * Safe for plastics and vinyl
  * Heavy-duty degreasing capability
- Best For: Deep cleaning, restoration, neglected carts
- Use Frequency: As needed for tough cleaning jobs
- Application: Spray generously, let sit 2-3 minutes, wipe clean

## Product 4: TIGON Spray Elite Protection
- SKU: TIGON-ELITE-24
- Price: $44.99 USD
- Size: 24 fl oz (710ml)
- Form Factor: Spray bottle
- Description: Our premium flagship formula combining cleaning and protection
  in one superior product. Elite Protection delivers showroom-quality results
  with long-lasting shine and unmatched durability.
- Key Features:
  * Premium 2-in-1 formula (clean + protect)
  * Showroom-quality shine
  * Maximum UV protection (up to 45 days)
  * Hydrophobic water-repelling coat
  * Professional-grade premium formula
- Best For: Enthusiasts, show carts, premium maintenance
- Use Frequency: Monthly for optimal protection
- Application: Apply to clean, dry surface in overlapping strokes

# ===============================================================================
# TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS (ALL PRODUCTS)
# ===============================================================================

## Common Specifications
- pH Level: Neutral (pH 7.0-7.5), safe for all surfaces
- Base: Water-based formula
- VOC Content: Low VOC, compliant with California regulations
- Biodegradability: 90%+ biodegradable within 28 days
- Manufacturing: Made in USA
- Shelf Life: 3 years from manufacture date
- Storage: Store at room temperature, avoid freezing
- Flash Point: Non-flammable

## Surface Compatibility
- Plastic components (seats, dashboards, trim)
- Vinyl upholstery and covers
- Painted metal surfaces
- Chrome and polished metal
- Rubber tires and trim
- Fiberglass body panels
- Acrylic windshields (except Elite Protection)
- Leather seats (test in inconspicuous area first)

## NOT Recommended For
- Hot surfaces (allow cart to cool first)
- Electrical components (avoid direct spray)
- Battery terminals
- Open wounds or skin application

# ===============================================================================
# USE CASES & APPLICATIONS
# ===============================================================================

## Personal Golf Cart Owners
- Weekly maintenance after golf rounds
- Seasonal deep cleaning
- Pre-storage preparation
- Post-winter restoration

## Golf Courses & Country Clubs
- Fleet maintenance programs
- Daily quick-clean routines
- Monthly deep cleaning schedules
- Tournament preparation

## Golf Cart Dealers & Resellers
- Pre-sale detailing
- Inventory maintenance
- Customer demo units
- Trade-in reconditioning

## Retirement Communities
- Community cart programs
- Personal cart maintenance
- Neighborhood vehicle care

# ===============================================================================
# GEOGRAPHIC & MARKET INFORMATION
# ===============================================================================

## Primary Markets (USA)
- Florida: Largest golf cart market, year-round use
- Arizona: High UV exposure, dust protection needs
- California: Eco-conscious consumers, large golf community
- Texas: Growing market, extreme weather conditions
- Carolinas: Golf destination, seasonal considerations
- Georgia: Golf heritage, active golf community

## Climate Considerations
- High UV regions: Recommend Pro Shield or Elite Protection
- Humid climates: Focus on water-resistant formulas
- Desert climates: Dust and sun protection priority
- Coastal areas: Salt and moisture resistance

## Market Size
- Estimated 1.5+ million golf carts in US
- Growing personal-use market beyond golf courses
- Increasing use in gated communities and resorts

# ===============================================================================
# CUSTOMER KNOWLEDGE BASE
# ===============================================================================

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How often should I clean my golf cart?
A: For regular use, we recommend cleaning weekly with Original Formula. Apply
   Pro Shield or Elite Protection monthly for ongoing protection.

Q: Can I use TIGON Spray on my golf cart's windshield?
A: Yes, Original Formula and Ultra Clean are safe for acrylic windshields.
   Elite Protection should be avoided on windshields due to its coating.

Q: Is TIGON Spray safe for vinyl seats?
A: Absolutely. All TIGON Spray products are specifically formulated to be
   safe for vinyl, plastic, and most golf cart surfaces.

Q: How does UV protection work?
A: Our formulas contain UV-blocking compounds that create a protective layer
   on surfaces, preventing sun damage, fading, and oxidation.

Q: Are TIGON Spray products environmentally friendly?
A: Yes. All our products are biodegradable, use low-VOC formulations, and
   are designed to minimize environmental impact.

Q: Can I use TIGON Spray on an electric golf cart?
A: Yes, but avoid spraying directly on electrical components, battery
   terminals, or charging ports.

- Pro Shield (20oz): $34.99

- Direct: tigonspray.com (Free Shipping)
- Amazon: Amazon.com/shops/tigonspray
- Affiliate Partners: 10% commission program

## Shipping Information
- Free shipping on all orders (direct website)
- Ships within 1-2 business days
- Delivery: 3-7 business days (contiguous US)
- International: Available through Amazon

- Golf lifestyle influencers
- Retirement community marketers
